mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER(user_id, user_pwd, user_birth_dt, user_contact_num, user_nickname, user_reg_dt, user_modify_dt) VALUES(#{userId}, password(#{userPwd}), #{userBirthDt}, #{userContactNum}, #{userNickname}, now(), now())
